heading.name: Consider COPD
heading.definition: Patients with copd dx in 2+ bills or 2+ visit encounters within last 3 years or FEV1/FVC < 0.7 OR Current Tiotroprium medication
heading.notes: Created for Doctors of BC i) COPD dx in 2+ bills: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 32398004, 63480004, 61937009, 74417001, 185086009, 49158009, 12295008, 13645005 OR starting with 490-492, 494, 496 AND with >= 2 Bills with the ICD9 diagnosis code starting with 490-492, 494, 496 in the last 3 years" ii) COPD dx in 2+ visits: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 32398004, 63480004, 61937009, 74417001, 185086009, 49158009, 12295008, 13645005 OR starting with 490-492, 494, 496 AND with >= 2 Visit Encounters with Snomed diagnosis code 32398004, 63480004, 61937009, 74417001, 185086009, 49158009, 12295008, 13645005 or the ICD9 diagnosis code starting with 490-492, 494, 496 in the last 3 years" iii) "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 32398004, 63480004, 61937009, 74417001, 185086009, 49158009, 12295008, 13645005 OR starting with 490-492, 494, 496 AND has a FEV1 < 0.7 OR Current Tiotroprium medication (ATC code R03BB04)"

indicatorQuery.query: SELECT IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND fin.billcount >= ${numOfBills}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "Number with COPD dx in ${numOfBills}+ bills", IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND fin.visitcount >= ${numOfVisits}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "Number with COPD dx in ${numOfVisits}+ visits", IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND (fin.fev1_fvc < ${fev1_fvc} OR (fin.fev1_fvc > 1 AND fin.fev1_fvc < 100*${fev1_fvc}) OR fin.medcount >= ${numOfMeds})) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "Number with FEV1/FVC < ${fev1_fvc}% OR Tiotroprium" FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, BILLING.billcount AS billcount, VISIT.visitcount AS visitcount, OBS.fev1_fvc AS fev1_fvc, MEDS.numOfMeds as medcount, dxr.dxresearch_code AS dx, dxr.coding_system AS dxs FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demographic_no, dxresearch_code, coding_system, COUNT(dxresearch_code) FROM dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND ( (LEFT(dxresearch_code, 3) IN ${dxcodesICD} AND coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxresearch_code IN ${dxcodesSnoMed} AND coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) dxr ON d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no -- Billed 490,491,492,494,496 in last 3 years LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.demographic_no AS demographic_no, b.dx_code1 AS dxcode1, b.dx_code2 AS dxcode2, b.dx_code3 AS dxcode3, COUNT(b.demographic_no) AS billcount FROM billingmaster b WHERE b.dx_code1 IN ${billingCode} OR b.dx_code2 IN ${billingCode} OR b.dx_code3 IN ${billingCode} AND DATE(b.createdate) > ${lowerLimit.billingdate} AND b.demographic_no > 0 GROUP BY b.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(b.demographic_no) > -1 ) BILLING ON (d.demographic_no = BILLING.demographic_no) -- Coded dx during visit encounter in last 3 years LEFT JOIN( SELECT ASSIGNED.demographic_no AS demographic_no, observation_date AS visitdate, uuid, COUNT(ASSIGNED.demographic_no) AS visitcount FROM casemgmt_note note INNER JOIN ( SELECT note_id, CODED.demo_no AS demographic_no FROM casemgmt_issue_notes INNER JOIN ( SELECT ci.id AS id, ci.update_date, ci.demographic_no demo_no FROM issue i INNER JOIN casemgmt_issue ci ON i.issue_id = ci.issue_id WHERE (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysICD} AND LEFT(i.code,3) IN ${dxcodesICD}) OR (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed} AND i.code IN ${dxcodesSnoMed}) ) CODED ON (casemgmt_issue_notes.id = CODED.id) ORDER BY CODED.demo_no ) ASSIGNED ON note.note_id = ASSIGNED.note_id AND -- GET LAST REVISION OF NOTE note.note_id= (SELECT MAX(cmn.note_id) FROM casemgmt_note cmn WHERE cmn.uuid = note.uuid) AND DATE(note.observation_date) > ${lowerLimit.visitdate} GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) VISIT ON (d.demographic_no = VISIT.demographic_no) -- FEV1/FVC measurement LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField AS fev1_fvc, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = 'FEV1' GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = 'FEV1' AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo ) OBS ON (d.demographic_no = OBS.demographic_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dr.demographic_no, count(DISTINCT dr.atc) AS numOfMeds FROM drugs AS dr WHERE dr.archived = 0 AND dr.ATC LIKE ${drug} AND (dr.long_term OR (dr.rx_date <= NOW() AND (DATE_ADD(dr.rx_date, INTERVAL(DATEDIFF(dr.end_date,dr.rx_date)*1.0) DAY)) >= NOW())) GROUP BY dr.demographic_no ) MEDS ON (d.demographic_no = MEDS.demographic_no) WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${active} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND d.provider_no LIKE '${provider}' AND d.demographic_no NOT IN ${excludedPatient} ) fin

drillDownQuery.query: SELECT * FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demographic_no, dxresearch_code, coding_system, COUNT(dxresearch_code) FROM dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND ( (LEFT(dxresearch_code,3) IN ${dxcodesICD} AND coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxresearch_code IN ${dxcodesSnoMed} AND coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) dxr ON d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no -- Billed 490,491,492,494,496 in last 3 years LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.demographic_no AS demographic_no, b.dx_code1 AS dxcode1, b.dx_code2 AS dxcode2, b.dx_code3 AS dxcode3, COUNT(b.demographic_no) AS billcount FROM billingmaster b WHERE b.dx_code1 IN ${billingCode} OR b.dx_code2 IN ${billingCode} OR b.dx_code3 IN ${billingCode} AND DATE(b.createdate) > ${lowerLimit.billingdate} AND b.demographic_no > 0 GROUP BY b.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(b.demographic_no) > -1 ) BILLING ON (d.demographic_no = BILLING.demographic_no) -- Coded dx during visit encounter in last 3 years LEFT JOIN( SELECT ASSIGNED.demographic_no AS demographic_no, observation_date AS visitdate, uuid, COUNT(ASSIGNED.demographic_no) AS visitcount FROM casemgmt_note note INNER JOIN ( SELECT note_id, CODED.demo_no AS demographic_no FROM casemgmt_issue_notes INNER JOIN ( SELECT ci.id AS id, ci.update_date, ci.demographic_no demo_no FROM issue i INNER JOIN casemgmt_issue ci ON i.issue_id = ci.issue_id WHERE (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysICD} AND LEFT(i.code,3) IN ${dxcodesICD}) OR (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed} AND i.code IN ${dxcodesSnoMed}) ) CODED ON (casemgmt_issue_notes.id = CODED.id) ORDER BY CODED.demo_no ) ASSIGNED ON note.note_id = ASSIGNED.note_id AND -- GET LAST REVISION OF NOTE note.note_id= (SELECT MAX(cmn.note_id) FROM casemgmt_note cmn WHERE cmn.uuid = note.uuid) AND DATE(note.observation_date) > ${lowerLimit.visitdate} GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) VISIT ON (d.demographic_no = VISIT.demographic_no) -- FEV1/FVC measurement LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField AS fev1_fvc, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = 'FEV1' GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = 'FEV1' AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo ) OBS ON (d.demographic_no = OBS.demographic_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dr.demographic_no, count(DISTINCT dr.atc) AS numOfMeds FROM drugs AS dr WHERE dr.archived = 0 AND dr.ATC LIKE ${drug} AND (dr.long_term OR (dr.rx_date <= NOW() AND (DATE_ADD(dr.rx_date, INTERVAL(DATEDIFF(dr.end_date,dr.rx_date)*1.0) DAY)) >= NOW())) GROUP BY dr.demographic_no ) MEDS ON (d.demographic_no = MEDS.demographic_no) WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${active} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND dxr.dxresearch_code IS NULL AND ((BILLING.billcount IS NOT NULL AND BILLING.billcount >= ${numOfBills}) OR (VISIT.visitcount IS NOT NULL AND VISIT.visitcount >= ${numOfVisits}) OR (OBS.fev1_fvc IS NOT NULL AND (OBS.fev1_fvc < ${fev1_fvc} OR (OBS.fev1_fvc > 1 AND OBS.fev1_fvc < 100*${fev1_fvc}))) OR (MEDS.numOfMeds IS NOT NULL AND MEDS.numOfMeds >= ${numOfMeds})) AND d.provider_no LIKE '${provider}' AND d.demographic_no NOT IN ${excludedPatient} ORDER BY d.demographic_no
